page.title: 17SCOUTS IN BRADWELL.
page.content: Every Wednesday there is a scouts meeting at the school.We start at 7.15 and get into our groups before breaking the flag.Then we play a game of dodge ball.After this we do program work.This Wednesday we are doing country codes like "shut gates behind you".After programme work we have a wide game.One patrol goes out and another group has to find them. The group that runs has to get back to the school and they have won.Then we have flag down at 9 o'clock.Sometimes we go to camp at Cosgrove.We go on Friday and camp over night .In the morning we go for a wash and then we cook break fast.In the day we play wide games and go for walks to the shops. Sometimes we practice our axe work.We go back on Sunday morning after breakfast.
